title: Premium to be received by the Planning Authority as per provisions in this regulation shall be deposited in a separate fund viz
clause_text: Premium to be received by the Planning Authority as per provisions in this regulation shall be deposited in a separate fund viz. "Critical Infrastructure Fund for IT/ITES Industries" and this fund shall be utilized only for creation of Critical Infrastructure for IT/ITES Industries:
section: 33(13) â€“ Buildings of Information Technology Establishments
